dkeep.logic

Class Ogre

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.Agent
      • dkeep.logic.Ogre

  • public class Ogre
extends Agent
    Implements the enemy for the second level (may be used elsewhere)
    Author:
    Miguel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ogre()
      Creates an ogre with default values
      Ogre(int x, int y, boolean move, boolean attack)
      Creates an ogre with the specified position and behaviour

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attack()
      Updates the ogre's club's postion, as it attacks in a random direction
      Coords getClub()
      Get the ogre's club's position
      boolean hasClub()
      Is the ogre allowed to attack?
      void move(Coords newPos)
      Moves the ogre to the specified position if awake, decreases remaining sleep time if sleeping
      Coords newCoords()
      The ogre moves in a random direction, this method decides its new position
      void sleepNow()
      The ogre was beaten by the hero and sleeps for 2 turns

      • Ogre

            int y,
            boolean move,
            boolean attack)
        Creates an ogre with the specified position and behaviour
        Parameters:
        x - X position
        y - Y position
        move - Whether the ogre moves or not
        attack - Whether the ogre attacks or not

    • Method Detail

      • newCoords

        public Coords newCoords()
        The ogre moves in a random direction, this method decides its new position
        Returns:
        Coords object corresponding to the ogre's new position

        Moves the ogre to the specified position if awake, decreases remaining sleep time if sleeping

      • attack

        public void attack()
        Updates the ogre's club's postion, as it attacks in a random direction

      • getClub

        Get the ogre's club's position
        Returns:
        Coords object with the position of the club

      • hasClub

        public boolean hasClub()
        Is the ogre allowed to attack?
        Returns:
        true if yes, false otherwise

      • sleepNow

        public void sleepNow()
        The ogre was beaten by the hero and sleeps for 2 turns
